games.title: Games
games.info: Game based learning is designed to balance subject matter with gameplay and the ability of the player to retain and apply said subject matter to the real world.

break.title: Break
break.info: When studying it is very important to take a 15 minute break every hour when using a computer device, otherwise you risk fatigue and headaches, thus reducing productivity.

water.title: Water
water.info: It is vital to stay hydrated when studying. De-hydration leads to increased chances of headaches and tiredness. By staying hydrated the body has more energy and is more alert.
